title: Role of Higher Education Instructional Designers and Field Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and higher education administration experience
context.additional_context: Role model development and field case analysis centered on practical training

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core roles and scope of responsibilities of instructional designers in higher education settings.
Learners can analyze conflict factors in instructional design contexts using qualitative research methods based on activity theory.
Learners can derive resolution strategies for field issues such as delayed task processing and role ambiguity.
Learners can submit a project deliverable designing a collaborative system between instructors and instructional designers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
